creator: medDigital
descriptionHtml:
medCrowd keeps everyone in touch while protecting confidential health and care information to the required standards.

Messaging apps are the best way to keep in touch with your health or care team, including doctors, nurses, social workers, physiotherapists and other caregivers.

But popular messaging apps don’t protect confidential information to the required standards so private information may not be safe. What’s more, the use of these non-compliant apps to share health and care information may be breaching the law.

So, medCrowd keeps everyone in touch while protecting confidential health and care information to the required standards.

CONNECT WITH YOUR TEAM
Safely and conveniently discuss confidential information with your health or care team.

Keep in touch on any computer, mobile phone or tablet device, and even through integrations with other electronic systems like care records, because information is protected from the moment you login. Use secure logins with a complex password, fingerprints or facial recognition.

PROTECT CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION

NHS guidance states that non-compliant messaging technologies (like WhatsApp) or social networks (like Facebook Messenger or Groups) must not be used to share confidential information.

But, medCrowd is compliant with the NHS Commercial Third Party Information Governance, HIPAA, UK Data Protection Act and the European General Data Protection Regulation with ISO 27001 certification being finalised.

So, use medCrowd, the instant messenger for health and care, to make sure all health and care information is kept safe.

FEATURES
+ Keep in touch on any computer, mobile phone or tablet device.
+ Protect confidential information to the required standards.
+ Use secure logins with a complex password, fingerprints or facial recognition.
+ Encrypted at rest and in transit.
+ Invite everyone you need to join the conversation.
+ Automatic timeout after a period of inactivity to prevent unauthorised access.

ADVANCED FEATURES
+ Integrate conversations with care records and other electronic systems.
+ Connect with care rotas to manage team membership automatically.
+ Pay for specialist advice with paid conversations
+ And additional enterprise features for organisations, get in touch to find out more.

IN THE NEWS
Mentioned by BBC News, Sun on Sunday, Daily Telegraph, Guardian Healthcare Professionals Network, Health Service Journal, DigitalHealth.net and PharmaTimes.

GET IN TOUCH
We love to hear from medCrowd users, please give us your honest feedback, good and bad! Email Support@medCrowd.com so we can listen and enhance your experience.
descriptionShort: Compliant messenger for health and care

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Please get in touch by emailing support@medCrowd.com with any comments or suggestions, especially if you have experienced issues with our app. We're making it better every day and we need your help to get it right.
